review: I think we would have loved this to use with Netflix. Unfortunately, when it arrived we found out that the HDMI on our TV is not compatible with the Fire stick. There was no where in all of the research we did, that mentioned if you have HDMI/DV port it will not work! Customer service at Amazon (who was very helpful and spent a good amount of time trying to figure out our problem) told us that the correct type of HDMI port had only been in TVs about 7 years, so if your TV is a little older, please try to check carefully before you buy. A far as I could see in the specs (admittedly I don't understand them completely) we had everything we needed - HDMI, HDTV, 1020i, etc. It was one devide that looked like it would be really easy to use and we are very disappointed.
